entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
